name: Sanjay Chouhan
position: IIT KGP'23 | Product | Data | Strategy | Analytics |  Growth | OASCM
about: I am an IIT Kharagpur graduate with experience across FMCG-eCommerce, Fintech, and Edtech industries. I have worked at L.E.K. Consulting as an Analyst and interned in Product, Strategy, and Operations roles at Eggoz Nutrition, BitClass, and Tortoise. My expertise includes data analytics, product management, business strategies, operations management, market research, and stakeholder management. Proficient in Python, SQL, and Advanced Excel, I excel at deriving actionable insights from data, delivering strategic intelligence, and driving impactful business outcomes.

current_company.name: L.E.K. Consulting
current_company.title: IIT KGP'23 | Product | Data | Strategy | Analytics |  Growth | OASCM

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: Led end-to-end market research initiatives; maintained databases, and performed revenue trend analysis; analyzed results by interpreting data, & evaluated output requirements; delivered strategic insights to drive informed decision-making
experience.description_html: Led end-to-end market research initiatives; maintained databases, and performed revenue trend analysis; analyzed results by interpreting data, & evaluated output requirements; delivered strategic insights to drive informed decision-making <!---->

experience.title: Product Analyst
experience.description: • Predicted product sales demand with 98.8% accuracy, reducing losses by 6% for that particular region.• Reduced the loss due to high replacement percent by analyzing the data of relevant retailer's store and providing strategic solutions for improve inventory management, thereby saving INR 1.7 lacs weekly.• Performed seasonal sales trend analysis for suspected areas, delivering a detailed report that enabled data-driven strategies to mitigate festive season sales decline. • Developed three no-code dynamic web applications using bubble.io and made the work of JSEs and farmers easy, flawless and efficient. Made a comprehensive list of redundant data in the company's database by running a sanity check over the data.
